item.title: Github Pages + Hugo搭建个人博客实践
item.description:
1 安装Hugo

Hugo官方文档：https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/

Hugo中文文档：https://www.gohugo.org/doc/overview/introduction/

item.title: Basic HTML Elements
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to make sure that all basic HTML Elements are decorated with CSS so as to not miss any possible elements when creating new themes for Hugo.

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme.
